mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASK(writer, book_id, ask_contents, ask_date, ask_sort) VALUES(#{writer}, #{book_id}, #{ask_contents}, now(), #{ask_sort})
mapper.select: SELECT A.ask_id, B.book_title, A.ask_sort, A.ask_date, B.book_cover, A.askreply_count, A.writer, A.ask_status FROM ASK A, BOOK B WHERE A.book_id = B.book_id AND A.writer = #{writer} ORDER BY A.ask_id DESC LIMIT #{start}, 5

SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT R.@ROWNUM := R.@ROWNUM + 1 AS rownum, O.* FROM (SELECT R.@ROWNUM := 0) R, (SELECT A.ask_id, B.book_title, A.ask_sort, A.ask_date, B.book_cover, A.askreply_count, A.writer FROM ASK A, BOOK B WHERE A.book_id = B.book_id AND A.writer = #{writer} ORDER BY A.ask_id DESC) O) C WHERE C.rownum = #{pageNumber}
SELECT * FROM ASK WHERE ask_id = #{ask_id} AND available = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASKREPLY (ask_id, writer, askreply_contents, askreply_date) VALUES (#{ask_id}, #{writer}, #{askreply_contents}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE ASK B SET B.askreply_count = (SELECT COUNT(A.ask_id) FROM ASKREPLY A WHERE A.ask_id = #{ask_id}) WHERE B.ask_id = #{ask_id}
